findings.title: Improper Integer Division
findings.description: The contracts utilize integer division math which always rounds down in Solidity, causing Blockimmo AG to not collect a full fee percentage.

findings.title: Missing clarity regarding specific contract constants
findings.description: The whitepaper does not provide clear information about token amounts, prices in USD or Ether, percentages of shares for sale, or ICO dates, which is important for non-technical readers to review the data.
